'''{{PAGENAME}}''' is a [[Pillars of Eternity II: Deadfire world map|location]] in {{poe2}}.

==Background==
Found in the Sacred Stair district of [[Neketaka]], this ancient temple has been occupied by the [[Children of the Dawnstars]] to act as the center of their efforts across Deadfire Archipelago.

==Points of interest==
* This is a single, vast chamber filled with remnants of the old temple. Much of the floor is submerged in water, so watch your step.
* As you enter, [[Adaryc]] will stand by the pillar (if you let him live and allied with him during the events in the White March).

==Characters==
* [[High Priestess Saewyn]], leader of this particular group of worshippers.
* [[Nordagand]]
* [[Xoti]], potential companion (only if you did not recruit her in [[Port Maje Harbor]]).
* [[Ogne (Deadfire)|Ogne]], a member of the [[Partisans of the Lighted Path]] (during [[The Lighted Path]])

* {{legacy|poe1}} The appearance of these characters depends on your choices in {{poe1}}:
** [[Adaryc Cendamyr]], if you resolved {{wm2}} [[The Iron Flail]] peacefully.
** [[Wirtan]], if he was not killed during the quest [[Buried Secrets]].

==Pets==
* [[Frau Nils]] - "Abandoned Cat": On the right hand side of the large tree.
title: Temple of Gaun
